articles.content:

articles.title: WandaVision is bonkers but now I'm a fan of the MCU - The Independent
articles.description: The new Disney+ TV show might be more rewarding if you have more than a passing knowledge of the superhero world, but it’s still magical to watch
articles.content: Ive never seen Avengers. Ive never wanted to. With two young children, I have enough crashing and banging at home. But there was something about the trailers for WandaVision that seemed intriguing it… [+989 chars]
